name: CCSChargePodcast
0:
”Alexa, open charge podcast”
”Alexa, ask charge podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start charge podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: charge podcast
des: Listen to the latest Charge podcast. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
